XXbsa0554u:5: prīṇantyeva vi + + + + hi śiśoḥ prāyaḥ pitṛṇāṃ manaḥ //
XXbsa0554u:11: nanu bhavadbhirasannevāvayavī pratijñāyate sa kathaṃ pratyakṣasidvaḥ /
XXbsa0554u:12: nāvayavinamiha dharmmiṇaṃ pratipannāḥ smaḥ kintu pratibhāsamānasthūla nīlādikamartham /
XXbsa0554u:13: na tarhi virudvadharmmasaṃsargādavayavina ekatvaṃ niṣidvaṃ syāt /
XXbsa0554u:25: ucyate, pratibhāsamānaḥ sthūlonīlākāraḥ pratyakṣasidvaṃ rūpaṃ, avayavitvānabhyupagame
XXbsa0554u:28: na paramāṇusañcayavādināṃ sthūlākāraḥ kaścidartho 'sti yaḥ prasidvo dharmmī syāditi /
XXbsa0554u:31: syānmataṃ niravayavāḥ paramāṇavaḥ kathaṃ pratyakṣe sthūlenā kāreṇāvabhāseran, sthūlasūkṣmayorvirodhāditi
XXbsa0554u:33: paramāṇava eva hi pararūpadeśaparihāreṇotpannāḥ parasparasahitā avabhāsamānā deśavitānavanto bhāsante /
XXbsa0554u:35: sthūlatvaṃ, yattuktaṃ sthūlasūkṣmayorvirodha iti tat kiṃ pararūpadeśaparihāravatī niravayavānāmutpattiḥ
XXbsa0554u:38: ataeva niravayaveṣu bahuṣvekasmin vijñāne pratibhāsa māneṣu bhavan pratibhāsakālabhāvī pratibhāsadharmmaḥ sthūlākāro na tu vāstavaḥ pratyekamabhāvāt /
XXbsa0554u:39: pratibhāsāt prāgūrdvaṃ vā na tarhi sthūlo 'rtha iti cet /
XXbsa0554u:40: na tadāpi pratibhāsayogyatāsambhavāt yadaiva hi sañcitā bhaveyustadaiva pratibhāsayogyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ /
XXbsa0554u:46: tadayaṃ nirantara eka eva sthalo niravayavānekātmako bhavitumarhati, api tvekaḥ sthūlātmaka eveti /
XXbsa0554u:57: tatrāpi kimeṣāmantaraṃ vivekaḥ pararūpaśūnyatā veti cintyaṃ /
XXbsa0554u:60: nanu ca na pratyekaṃ paramāṇūnāṃ sthūlākāraḥ /
XXbsa0554u:62: yathā ca nīlaparamāṇūnāṃ pratyekamasambhavan pītākāro bahuṣvapi na dṛśyate /
XXbsa0554u:63: tathā pratyekamasambhavan sthūlākāraḥ kathaṃ bahuṣu syāditi /
XXbsa0554u:67: tataḥ pītavirudvaṃ nīlākāraṃ vibhrāṇeṣu bahuṣvapi kathaṃ pītākāro bhavet /
XXbsa0554u:69: / tadevaṃ pratyakṣasidvaḥ sthūlo 'rtha iha dharmmīti vyavasthitaṃ /
XXbsa0554u:70: tadevamavasthite dharmmiṇi hetoḥ sattvamasattvaṃ vā nirūpyaṃ /
XXbsa0554u:71: tatra pāṇyādāvekasmin kampamāne sthūlo 'rthaḥ sakampaniḥkampe rūpe yugapat
XXbsa0554u:77: iha ca sakampaniḥkampe rūpe gṛhṇat pratyakṣameva sāmarthyāt parasparābhāvaṃ sādhayati /
XXbsa0554u:79: syādetat pāṇyādāvekasminnavayave kampamāne nāvayavinaḥ kampa rūpamabhyupeyaṃ /
XXbsa0554u:80: avayava eva hi tadā kriyāvān dṛśyate /
XXbsa0554u:83: bhavitavyaṃ, yathā rathe calati tadā rūḍho 'pi calatīti /
XXbsa0554u:89: yadā tu śarīrakampanārthaḥ prayatnaviśeṣa ātmano jāyate /
XXbsa0554u:91: ato bhinnamiti tayorekasmin jāte kathaṃ nimittāntarapratibadvajanmā tadabhāve tadaparo 'pi tathaiva jāyeta /
XXbsa0554u:92: ratha tadārūḍhakarmmaṇostu satyapi nimittabhede nimittayaugapadyāt sahabhāvaḥ /
XXbsa0554u:95: tayośca sahabhāvāt karmmaṇī api yaugapadyena jāyete /
XXbsa0554u:100: tena ca saṃyoge 'samavāyikāraṇe nivarttate nivarttetāvayavi dravyamiti /
XXbsa0554u:117: tasmādavayavini kriyāvati avayavāḥ kriyāvanta ityakāmakairapi vaiśeṣikairidamabhyupeyaṃ /
XXbsa0554u:118: yathā cāvayavikriyāyāmavayavāḥ kriyāvanta stathāvayaveṣvapi kriyāvatsu tadavayavaiḥ kriyāvadbhirbhāvyamiti
XXbsa0554u:119: anayā diśā dvyaṇuke kriyāvati tadārambhakau paramāṇūkriyāvantau mantavyau /
XXbsa0554u:124: ekasya paramāṇoḥ kriyā na parasyeti cet /
XXbsa0554u:127: evañca bdyaṇukadravyasya kriyāvattve tryaṇuke 'pi kriyā syādityanena krameṇa paridṛśyamāno 'calaścalaḥ syādavayavaḥ /
XXbsa0554u:131: sāvayavo hi bhāva ekenāvayavena vastvantarasaṃyukta evāvayavāntarai ścalaiḥ /
XXbsa0554u:135: tathāhyāvṛte ekasmin pāṇyādau sthūlasyārthasyāvṛtānāvṛte rūpe yugapadbhavantī virudvadharmmadvayasaṃyogamasyāvedayataḥ
XXbsa0554u:147: sthūlopalabdhenimittaṃ, na cārdvāvaraṇe bhūyasāmavayavānāmastīndriyasannikarṣaḥ tato na sthūlagrahaṇamiti /
XXbsa0554u:154: atha sthūlatvākhyaḥ parimāṇaviśeṣo guṇaḥ sa drabyādanya eveti cet /
XXbsa0554u:161: yadyevaṃ sa eva tarhyavayavaḥ svena parimāṇena sambadvaḥ pratyakṣostvāvaraṇakālenāvayavī /
XXbsa0554u:164: yasya hi mahato 'vayavasya tata parimāṇaṃ sa tāvat svena parimāṇena sambadvaḥ pratibhāti /
XXbsa0554u:165: avayavinaśca tatparimāṇasambadvapratibhāsābhyupagame dvayoḥ samaparimāṇayorayavāyavavinoḥ pratibhāsa āsajyate /
XXbsa0554u:168: syādetadyasyāvayavasya parimāṇenāvayavī sambadvaḥ pratibhāti sa svaṃ parimāṇaṃ parityajyābhātīti
XXbsa0554u:171: na ca bādhakamantareṇa bhrāntirapi śakyā vyavasthāpayitum /
XXbsa0554u:174: paramadhyāvarttināmavayavānāmindriyasannikarṣābhāve sthūlatamāvayavidarśanānupapatteḥ syānmataṃ nikhilā vayavadarśanaṃ na sthūlapratyakṣakāraṇaṃ /
XXbsa0554u:178: tato na yāvanniravaśeṣāvayavadarśanaṃ tāvat kathaṃ sthūlatamārthapratipattiḥ syāt /
XXbsa0554u:181: krameṇa diśāmavayavānāṃ pratyakṣīkaraṇe pratyakṣaḥ sthūlo 'vayavīti cet /
XXbsa0554u:182: anyadā tu kaḥ pratyakṣaḥ iti vimṛṣyaṃ /
XXbsa0554u:184: avayavī api paramadhyavarttino na yugapaddṛśyanta iti kathaṃ so 'pi
XXbsa0554u:186: tadevaṃ nāvayavī nāvayavāḥ pratyakṣā iti na kiñcidṛśyeteti /
XXbsa0554u:190: 'rtho raktārakte rūpe yugapat pratipadyamāno virudvarūpadvayayogamātmanaḥ prakāśayati /
XXbsa0554u:191: nanva vayava eva rakto 'vayavī tvaraktaikarūpa eveti /
XXbsa0554u:197: avaśyaṃ hi kāraṇasaṃyoginā kāryyamapi saṃyujyata iti samayāt /
XXbsa0554u:199: asti hi kuṅkumārakte paṭāvayave kuṅkumāraktaḥ paṭa iti pratyayaḥ /
XXbsa0554u:200: tato rāgadravyasaṃyukta evāvayavīti tasyāpi varṇāntarānavabhāsaḥ syādavayavinaḥ /
XXbsa0554u:201: rāgadravyaṃ hi pratyāsīdat nijarūpaṃ vastuna stirodhatte svena ca rūpeṇa dravyaṃ sambandhati
XXbsa0554u:202: yathā raktovayavastirohitasahajarūpo rāgadravyasamavāyinā rūpeṇa sambandhī pratibhāti /
XXbsa0554u:210: yadi hi svāśraye samaveto rūpādivat vyāpyavṛttirevāyaṃ /
XXbsa0554u:216: abhāvo hi bhāvanivṛttirūpo nāsya bhāvanivṛttiṃ hitvā rūpāntaramīkṣate /
XXbsa0554u:217: yaśca yannivṛttirūpaḥ sa kathaṃ tasmin satyeva bhavati
XXbsa0554u:219: tathā hyanalaṃ paśyannapi salilārthī tatra pravartteta /
XXbsa0554u:223: nanu tatra yadi jalaṃ syādupalabhyeta kimataḥ /
XXbsa0554u:232: tatra bhāvanivṛttirūpe 'bhāve sidve kathaṃ bhāvopalabdhirna bhrāntā syāt /
XXbsa0554u:236: rūparasayostu na parasparanivṛttī rūpamiti kathaṃ tadudāharaṇamiha śobheta /
XXbsa0554u:245: iha tāvadekasmin deśe paricchidyamāne tādrūpyapracyutirasya vyavacchidyate /
XXbsa0554u:248: yadi hi paricchidyamāno deśāntarasvabhāvo bhavettadā tadrūpa evopalabdho bhavet /
XXbsa0554u:249: deśāntararūpantu virahayya svena rūpeṇa prakāśamāno deśo deśāntarāsaṃsṛṣṭa ityavasīyate /
XXbsa0554u:250: yathā ca deśasya deśāntarāsaṃsargastathā tenādhārabhūtena deśena yadyāptaṃ rūpaṃ tadapi deśāntarasaṃsargādavicchinnaṃ bhavati /
XXbsa0554u:251: kathaṃ hi tena deśena vyāptaṃ rūpaṃ tadabhāvavati deśāntare vartteta /
XXbsa0554u:252: yathā ekena deśena vyāpto ghaṭo na deśāntare varttate /
XXbsa0554u:256: yaduta ekadeśavyāptaṃ rūpaṃ na deśāntare varttate iti /
XXbsa0554u:258: tadabhāvavati deśāntare varttamāno 'pi tena deśena vyāpyeta /
XXbsa0554u:265: tathāhi bhāvābhāvāveva parasparaparihāreṇa virudvau na vastunī /
XXbsa0554u:267: tena yadeva vastu vastvantarapracyutimat tadeva tena virudvaṃ /
XXbsa0554u:270: ekakāryyanirvarttanaśaktimati ca rūpe gṛhyamāṇe kāryyāntara nirvarttanaśaktirapi paricchidyata iti /
XXbsa0554u:273: yathātyanta sadṛśorvastunoryugapadupalabhyamānayoḥ satyapi cākārabhede dūrādanupalakṣyamāṇabhedayordeśabhedamātranimittakaṃ pratyakṣāvasitaṃ virodhamāśritya bhedo 'vasthāpyate /
XXbsa0554u:275: yathaikaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ bhinneṣu cakṣurādiṣu varttate tadadhīnotpādatayā /
XXbsa0554u:278: so 'pi deśabhedanimitte virodhe 'vasthāpyamāne vastunaḥ kāraṇabhedanimittaṃviro dhamāsañjayan na naipuṇyamātmano nivedayati /
XXbsa0554u:291: tadevaṃ kamparāgāvaraṇabhāvābhāvakṛte deśabhedanibandhane ca caturthe virudvadharmmasaṃsarge
XXbsa0554u:296: tato virudvadharmmasaṃsarge 'pi bhavannabhedavyavahāro vyāpakaṃ nimittavattvaṃ jahyāt /
XXbsa0554u:303: evaṃ mayā bahuṣu durmmatinirmmiteṣu pratyudvṛteṣu khalu dūṣaṇakaṇṭakeṣu /
